definition: to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss

sentences.english: The week-old peace talks there between the two sides were near collapse.
sentences.chinese: 两方在该处持续一周的和谈快将破裂。

sentences.english: If the US is not ready to sit at a negotiating table with the [North], it will go its own way.
sentences.chinese: 如果美国尚未准备重回和谈，朝鲜将自行其事。

sentences.english: Wang Yi said that this round of talks was convened when the peace talk process had entered a most critical stage.
sentences.chinese: 王毅说，本次会谈是在和谈进程进入攻坚阶段召开的。

sentences.english: What are the prospects foreseen by China for the peace-talk process and the peaceful resolution of the issue?
sentences.chinese: 对和谈进程及和平解决核问题的前景怎么看？

sentences.english: There is no sign of the peace talks resuming.
sentences.chinese: 没有任何恢复和谈的迹象。

sentences.english: Only recently has it become clear that both sides are ready for peace.
sentences.chinese: 只是最近才清楚，双方都已准备和谈。

sentences.english: They cannot reach an agreement in the peace talk and finally clubs are trump.
sentences.chinese: 他们在和谈中没能达成协议，最终以武力决雌雄。

sentences.english: The DPRK and US also showed willingness to hold peace talks.
sentences.chinese: 朝美双方也表现出和谈的意愿。

sentences.english: Peace talks began, first at Kaesong, then at Panmunjom.
sentences.chinese: 和谈开始，首先在开城，然后在板门店。

sentences.english: UDD sources told VOA, Mr. Thaksin backs the reconciliation plan.
sentences.chinese: UDD告诉VOA，他信已经回到和谈计划中。

sentences.english: How does China look at the prospect of Palestine-Israel peace talks?
sentences.chinese: 如何看待巴以和谈前景？

sentences.english: He pointed out that the Palestinian-Israeli peace talks should be to achieve the ultimate goal of good neighborliness and friendship.
sentences.chinese: 他指出，巴以和谈应该以达成睦邻友好为最终目的。

sentences.english: The present conflict may provide fresh impetus for peace talk.
sentences.chinese: 目前的冲突可能会给和谈提供新的推动力。

sentences.english: The latest news about the Mideast is the beginning of another round of peace-talks.
sentences.chinese: 关于中东的最新消息是另一回和谈已展开。

sentences.english: Yoo sung-ryong feeling peace talks must fail tomorrow, war broke out again.
sentences.chinese: 柳成龙预感明日和谈必定失败，战争会再次爆发。

sentences.english: It was reported that Chiang, though going into retirement, would maintain control over the peace movements.
sentences.chinese: 据报道，蒋虽然行将下野，但仍将继续控制和谈。

definition: to form an alliance/to ally oneself with/allied with/aligned/to bond with
to reconcile/to mediate/to bring warring parties to agreement/to arbitrate
